duties_responsibilities.duty: Support, mentor, and motivate hourly workforce
Manage safety, quality, productivity, and customer delivery promises
Collaborate with support teams - Safety, Engineering, Loss Prevention, Quality Assurance, Human Resources
Lift, push, pull, squat, bend, reach, stand/walk for up to 12 hours during shifts
Work in noisy and variable temperature environments, continuously climb and descend stairs
Plan and oversee participation in industry events and conferences

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or 2+ years of Amazon experience (Master's preferred)
Experience managing a team of 20+ employees
Process improvements (Lean process, Kaizen, and/or Six Sigma)

Industry experience in retail, F&B, military, manufacturing, automotive, biotech, electronics, energy, instrumentation, machinery, defense/aerospace, medical, cosmetics, production, or distribution environments
